overview:
Marcel Kaeding is a key member of the support and marketing teams at 6Wunderkinder. He helps with the user base and maintains quality throughout 6Wunderkinderâ€™s products. In addition, he assists the marketing team by building contacts and generating new marketing strategies and PR ideas. He also works on search engine optimization.

Prior to joining 6Wunderkinder, Marcel was the head Office Manager at Innovatics GmbH and was heavily involved with their marketing strategy. His current education takes place at the University of Potsdam where he studies economics.
